title: Hot air affair
creator_credit: Damon Smith, Greg Grainger and Grainger Maynard
brief_description: Follows the adventures of an all-female hot air ballooning team as they embark upon an international balloon race across Australia. The journey is not all smooth going, a few of the incidents include the balloon hitting a house and catching alight before finishing the spectaular, daring challenge.
